member.name: T:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Resolver.Resolver
member.summary: Class containing methods used to allow Navisworks .NET Control solutions to bind to a particular Navisworks Runtime.

member.name: M:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Resolver.Resolver.TryBindToRuntime(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Used to allow Navisworks .NET Control solutions to bind to a particular Navisworks Runtime. If successful it returns the runtime that was actually bound to, otherwise null. Once succeeded the method will aways return the original binding. This must be called before any attempt is to load any other Navisworks Assemblies, including Autodesk.Navisworks.Controls and Autodesk.Navisworks.Api. You can put multiple semi-colon separated product name entries here in preference order.

member.name: T:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Resolver.RuntimeNames
member.summary: Names of commonly found Navisworks Runtimes.

member.name: P:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Resolver.RuntimeNames.NavisworksManage
member.summary: Name of runtime corresponding to Navisworks Manage.

member.name: P:Autodesk.Navisworks.Api.Resolver.RuntimeNames.NavisworksSimulate
member.summary: Name of runtime corresponding to Navisworks Simulate.
